snippet: With Andrei Markov nursing an upper-body injury and Shea Weber in a scoring slump, the Montreal Canadiens needed a defenseman to step up....
lead_paragraph: With Andrei Markov nursing an upper-body injury and Shea Weber in a scoring slump, the Montreal Canadiens needed a defenseman to step up.

headline.main: Petry Steps Up for Banged Up Canadiens in Win Over Ducks
headline.print_headline: Petry Steps Up for Banged Up Canadiens in Win Over Ducks
